original_text: Then the king was exceedingly glad, and commanded that Daniel be taken up out of the den. So Daniel was taken up out of the den, and no kind of harm was found on him, because he had trusted in his God.
korean_text: 왕이 심히 기뻐서 명하여 다니엘을 굴에서 올리라 하매 그들이 다니엘을 굴에서 올린즉 그의 몸이 조금도 상하지 아니하였으니 이는 그가 자기의 하나님을 믿음이었더라

sentences.original_text: Then the king was exceedingly glad
and commanded that Daniel be taken up out of the den
So Daniel was taken up out of the den
and no kind of harm was found on him
because he had trusted in his God
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 그가 자기 하나님을 신뢰하였기 때문입니다
